channel.title: Please Read ! Need help Whit my 508 sever ! [ compiler ]
channel.description:
[b]Hello i'm merowi0 , and i started a new sever , every thing is working fine , [u]BUT[/u] there is one problem !! i cant compile , please can some one make a working compiler i got jdk_18 , windows 7 here some pictures
My sever : [IMG]http://i1025.photobucket.com/albums/y313/merowio/pic3.png[/img]
Some folders for jdk: [IMG]http://i1025.photobucket.com/albums/y313/merowio/pic2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1025.photobucket.com/albums/y313/merowio/Pic1.png[/img]
Please help me , Thanks -Merowi0[/b][b][/b]

item.title: Please Read ! Need help Whit my 508 sever ! [ compiler ]
item.dc:creator: @merowi0 merowi0
item.description:
@merowi0 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:8, topic:335923”]check above your post;
Go to the top of the application and select where your compiler.bat is in the ‘batch file’ field and then go to the textbox below and choose where to save it.
/thread[/quote]

I get a .exe file after that program thing , but its still not working

Read full topic

item.title: Please Read ! Need help Whit my 508 sever ! [ compiler ]
item.dc:creator: @merowi0 merowi0
item.description:
@merowi0 wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:2, topic:335923”]None of that matters. Show me what you have in your compiler batch file?

If you don’t know how Right Click>Edit (duh)[/quote]

@echo off
cd …/src
color 0a
Title *****Scape 508
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
pause

This is it , i think is totaly wrong

Read full topic
